name: Suspicious Downpour
description:
This game was created as an entry for the 2021 Aotearoa Game Jam. The theme was Light and Dark.

Credits

  • Hamish Oliver (HamishOliver) - Music, Sound, Design
  • Benjamin Gulliver (fatherbeno) - UI/UX, Design, Programming
  • Jared Bakker (Sugoi Yellow) - Graphics, Design, Programming
